channel.title: Alternative audio CODECs?
channel.description:
[Also posted on Sierra Wireless forum]
Hi
I was wondering what experience or advice others may have about audio CODECs for use with the WP7600-series devices? I'm looking for alternatives to the WM8944 used on the mangOH boards to reduce my BoM cost... in fact I don't really need a full blown codec, just mono analog audio out will suffice for audio playback from Legato or Linux applications. I don't need voice call ability.
Obviously will need to be either supported or be able to be compiled into the Linux build.
Thanks
